sections.title: Pre-Event Communication
items: Create Telegram group & topics (General, Seating, CH, Medical, etc.)
Send daily messages leading up to event
Identify group arrivals & review seating chart

sections.title: Seating Management
items: Organize reserved signs by numbering and labeling them
Collect signs each morning & replace as needed
Track missing or damaged signs, create workflow

sections.title: Registration Day Prep
items: Set up materials: T-shirts, banners, lanyards, wristbands, iPads
Know registration workflow & check-in targets
Prepare for special needs participants

sections.title: Compassionate Registration
items: Greet participants warmly, answer FAQs
Ensure special needs participants have proper seating
Track manual & electronic registration counts

sections.title: Building Coherent Team
items: Assign key roles (GLA, HST, Greeters, etc.)
Establish responsibilities for chair bands, group signs, reserved signs
Foster participant connections

sections.title: Sacred Space Setup
items: Set seating & reserved signs per the map
Post seating plan each night in Telegram
Manage missing signs before morning break

sections.title: Doors Open & Welcoming
items: Guide participants to seats, collect reserved signs
Ensure smooth flow & accessibility
Daily team huddles before doors open

sections.title: Coherence Healing (CH) Setup
items: Plan seating configurations, align with medical team
Organize HealEEs & HealERs, maintain order
Manage supplies (blankets, sheets, pens)

sections.title: Documentation & Updates
items: Use Google Sheets for real-time updates
Post seating maps & missing sign lists
Track medical and special participant needs

sections.title: Maintaining Safe & Sacred Space
items: Monitor fire exits & restricted areas
Guide participants with kindness & clarity
Preserve seating integrity

sections.title: Leadership & Service
items: Daily huddles & role rotations
Support team members & recognize contributions
Maintain personal energy & coherence
